Sir

There can, I apprehend, be no doubt that the present valuable part of Dr Carpenter's Researches on the Foraminifera, though in my opinion somewhat too lengthy, should be published in full in the Transactions , in conformity with the previous part. 
The [] will require ample

Down Bromley Kent
Sept 28/58

Sir

There can, I apprehend, be no
doubt that the present
valuable part of Dr Carpenter's 
Researches on the Foraminifera,
though in my opinion somewhat
too lengthy, should be published in full in the
Transactions, in conformity
with the previous part. 
The memoir will require ample 
illustrations.
Sir 
Your obed. sert 
Ch. Darwin 
To the 
Secretary 
Royal Soc.
